Title: Relates to providing incentive programs for teaching those with disabilities
Summary: Provides that undergraduate and/or graduate students who are matriculated in an approved graduate or undergraduate program at degree granting institutions located in the state of New York leading to a career as a primary or secondary teacher in a school providing special education, shall be eligible for an award.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to incentive programs for teaching those with disabilities
